hero.subtitle: Culinary Tradition meets Digital Future. The world's first "Play-to-Eat" ecosystem.

manifesto.title: Why PRG?
manifesto.text_1: In a world dominated by dogs, cats, and frogs, we forgot what matters most - food. PierogiCoin is not just a meme; it's a social movement connecting generations.
manifesto.text_2: Our goal is simple: Raise funds for a professional Smart Contract Audit (CertiK) through engaging Telegram gameplay, then shoot for the Moon (and eat it, if it's made of cheese).

tokenomics.title: Ingredients of Success
tokenomics.subtitle: A perfectly balanced recipe for economy (7,373,000,000 PRG).

team.title: Team
team.desc: 10% (737.3M PRG). 12-month cliff, followed by 36-month linear vesting.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.desc: 8% (589.8M PRG). 24-month linear vesting for campaigns and strategic partnerships.

game_rewards.title: Player Pool
game_rewards.desc: 5% (368.6M PRG). Dynamic release based on player activity within the Play-to-Earn ecosystem.

liquidity.title: Liquidity
liquidity.desc: 15% (1.105B PRG). 50% permanently locked (LP Burnt), remaining 50% released linearly over 24 months.

burn_mechanism.title: The Great Oven (Burn)
burn_mechanism.description: Deflationary mechanism: 1% of every sell transaction goes back to the 'Oven' and is burnt forever, reducing supply and increasing scarcity.

roadmap.title: Galactic Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our journey from the kitchen to the stars.

phase_1.title: Phase 1: Foundation (Q4 2024)
phase_1.desc: Conceptualization at the Christmas table, community building, and defining the PierogiCoin vision.

phase_2.title: Phase 2: Community Genesis (Q1 2025)
phase_2.desc: Building the tribe. Social media launch, core team assembly, and initial whitepaper draft.

phase_3.title: Phase 3: Strategy & Foundations (Q2 2025)
phase_3.desc: Laying the groundwork. Smart contract architecture, security audit preparations, and pre-marketing campaign.

phase_4.title: Phase 4: Realization (Q3 2025)
phase_4.desc: Website development, tokenomics optimization, Telegram game engine development, and Play-to-Audit campaign.

phase_5.title: Phase 5: Launch (Q4 2025)
phase_5.desc: Telegram game premiere, leaderboards, PRG token integration, and Genesis 2025 NFT Christmas drop.

phase_6.title: Phase 6: Expansion (2026+)
phase_6.desc: CEX listings, strategic partnerships, DeFi ecosystem growth, and premiere of the second game.
